subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT


ROSIE VS. ELISABETH ON "THE VIEW"!
The
political bickering between Rosie O'Donnell and Elisabeth
Hasselbeck gets downright nasty and turns into a knock-down,
drag-out fight you absolutely have to see to belive! The
play-by-play, tonight on TV's most provocative entertainment
news show. 

LINDSAY'S ALCOHOL SHOCKER!
Fresh out of rehab and attending AA meetings, Lindsay Lohan
is about to celebrate her 21st birthday -- and there are
reports that a vodka company is sponsoring the bash! Is
this really true? What could she be thinking? The answers, on
Showbiz Tonight. 

IS HOLLYWOOD FRESH OUT OF
IDEAS?
It's the year of the silver screen sequel!
Spider-Man, Pirates, Bourne, Shrek, the list goes on and on,
and it's all well and good, but Showbiz Tonight has to ask --
are there "any" new ideas left in Hollywood? We go searching,
tonight. 

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Bible-toting Paris Hilton: Is it just a publicity stunt?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A
VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the Question Of The
Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
